item.title: Assessing Security Practices of 3rd Party products
item.author: matt@copperwaite.net (Matt Copperwaite)
item.description: In recent months I’ve been involved in discussions about whether remote working tools are “secure” or not. The answer to any blunt question like that is, as always, “it depends”, but this is as helpful as getting financial advice from YouTube adverts.
